Tutorials

A series of hands-on tutorials for SAT-solving towards combinatorial problems is available at https://bsubercaseaux.github.io/tutorials/. Those tutorials were co-authored by Bernardo Subercaseaux and Marijn Heule.

A book with plenty of examples, both for SAT and SMT solving, is available at https://smt.st/, thanks to Dennis Yurichev.
